name: indefinably
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that is impossible to clearly describe or explain: The two versions are indefinably different. He seemed indefinably weary. See
indefinable
More examplesFewer examplesSomething in the music is indefinably familiar.There is something about him that is indefinably larger than life. Her accent sounded indefinably foreign.
